title: Star Anise
summaries: Star Anises are consumable ranged weapons, similar to Shurikens. 20–40 can drop from Presents obtained during the Christmas event, with a 6.301% chance in pre-Hardmode and a 5.881% chance in Hardmode. They are slightly stronger than Shurikens, but cannot be collected after use.

statistics.Sell: 5
